'''WildMIDI''' is a [[software synthesizer]] capable of using a wide variety of GUS patches. It is one of the options offered by [[ZDoom]] for [[MIDI]] playback.
==Setting up WildMIDI== * First, you will need to download a collection of [[GUS]] patches. * Then point the {{c|{{CVAR|S|wildmidi_config}}}} console variable to the GUS or TiMidity configuration file for these patches. * Finally, set WildMIDI as the MIDI device in the [[sound options]] menu.
==Advantages and drawbacks== * Only supports GUS patches, not SF2 [[soundfonts]]. * Better performances than [[TiMidity++]]
==See also== * [[Sound options]] * [[Sound fonts]]
